00040 typedef struct FRAME {
00041   int lineno;
00042   enum {frameK,framerelK} kind;

00044     struct {char *id;} frameF;
00045     struct {char *id; struct SIXNUMS *sixnums;} framerelF; 
00046   } val;
00047 } FRAME;

00057   int lineno;
00058   enum {uplinestartmacroK,emptystartmacroK} kind;
00059   union {
00060     struct {REAL length;REAL time;} uplineM; 
00061   } val;
00062 } STARTMACRO;

00065   int lineno;

00067   union {
00068     struct {REAL length;REAL time;} downlineM; 
00069     struct {REAL amplitude; REAL offsx; REAL offsz; REAL length; REAL freq; REAL time;} spiralM; 
00070   } val;
00071 } ENDMACRO;
